level.heading: Severability.
level.text: If any provision of this part or the application thereof to any person or circumstance is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect other provisions or the application of this part which can be effected without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of this part are severable.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 19-171 enacted into law Part A of subchapter IV of Chapter 28 of Title 47.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 19-171, see notes under § 47-2883.01.
